ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the Companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are the people of the right hand (and will succeed).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the People of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These are the people of the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are the people of the right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are those on the Right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are the people of the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are the Companions of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Their place will be on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who do so are the people of the right hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are the fellows of the righthand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the People of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such are the Companions of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are those on the Right Hand (the dwellers of Paradise),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are the Companions of the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are the people of happiness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the companions of the right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:18] Those, the ones described by the said attributes, are the ones of the right [side] (al-maymana means alyamīn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Their place will be on the right hand) those who are given their register in their right hands are the inhabitants of the Garden.
